name: Tictac And Tow
description:
The game is entirely in French for now.

Tictac and Tow is a game developed in a game jam with a team of three Game Designers and three Game Arts.

The theme was : The game is lying to you.

This game first looks like a simple Tic Tac Toe, but when the game suddenly crashes, it reveals more.

You are Tictac, in the city of Tow, meet strange characters and date them !
